meanings.definition: A group of small, insect-eating birds in the family Vireonidae.
meanings.sent1: Vireonines are known for their love of insects.
meanings.sent2: The vireonines chirped happily in the trees.
meanings.sent3: The vireonines held a meeting to discuss the tastiest bugs.
meanings.sent4: The forest came alive with the melodies of the vireonines.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the sight of the colorful vireonines flitting about.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of the vireonine birds.
meanings.sent1: Her vireonines-like song filled the garden with joy.
meanings.sent2: The feathers had a vireonines pattern of green and yellow.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with vireonines-inspired colors.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled with a vireonines brightness.
meanings.sent5: The room was painted in a vireonines palette, bringing nature indoors.

meanings.definition: The study or scientific classification of vireonine birds.
meanings.sent1: She dedicated her life to vireoninesology.
meanings.sent2: The vireoninesology department at the university was renowned.
meanings.sent3: The vireoninesology conference attracted experts from around the world.
meanings.sent4: His book on vireoninesology became a bestseller.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the history of vireoninesology.
